snippet.title: EXOCars — Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
PLAY NOW🔥

🏎️ PlayStation — https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10012101
🏎️ Quest — https://www.meta.com/en-gb/experiences/exocars/8057795767629913/
🏎️ Steam — https://store.steampowered.com/app/2898310/EXOcars/

Strap into EXOcars and compete against real players in single-player races and real-time multiplayer. Exciting driving feedback, advanced physics, and graphics make for an unparalleled VR buggy racing experience. 

⚡️ Diverse and Immersive Tracks
⚡️ Realistic Driving Experience
⚡️ Combat Mode
⚡️ Tournaments
⚡️ High-Quality Graphics Optimized for Meta Quest 3

🔥 Get ready to rev your engine, feel the rush, and experience the future of racing like never before. Are you excited to take on the challenge?

Join our Discord server to discuss and learn more about the game 👉 discord.com/invite/FSbEYSg6bZ
